content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? Are you looking for help with electrical, plumbing, or HVAC work?
Uh hi, yes—I think it's electrical. Some lights are flickering? Not sure what to do.
I understand, flickering lights can be concerning. I can help you schedule an appointment with one of our electricians. Could I please have your full name for the booking?
Oh, right, I'm Brian. Do you need anything else from me?
Thank you, Brian! Could you please provide your address so I can make sure you're in our service area and send the electrician to the right place?
Yeah, it's 221B Main Street. I think that should be right...
Great, thank you! Let me confirm you're in our service area.
You're within our service area! When would be a good time for our electrician to come by? Do you have a preferred date or time, or is it urgent?
Um, not sure... Like, tomorrow? But—uh, is it expensive? I just want to know before I book—I don't want a surprise.
That's a great question! I can provide a price estimate for an electrician visit regarding flickering lights. Please hold on a moment while I get that information.

Our typical charge for an initial electrical inspection for flickering lights is $99, which covers the visit and a basic diagnosis. If additional repairs are needed, we'll provide an estimate before starting any extra work. Would you like to schedule for tomorrow?
Oh. Um... okay, that's not... too bad I guess. Tomorrow morning if possible?
Thank you, Brian. I'll check our calendar for available times tomorrow morning.
We have an opening at 9 a.m. tomorrow. Would that work for you?
Um, yeah, 9am is okay. I guess book it. Do I need to do anything else?

You're all set, Brian! We've scheduled your electrical inspection for tomorrow at 9 a.m. at 221B Main Street. I'll send you a reminder before the appointment. If you have any questions or need to reschedule, please reply to this message.
